amendment.description: Amendment requires FEMA to make information available about the risk of flooding that might occur if a flood control measure other than a dam or levee would fail.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to add to the flood map modernization provisions of H.R. 3121 a requirement that FEMA map areas in the 100-year floodplain that would flood if not for a `levee, dam, or other man-made structure.'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walz (MN) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
